Desc.entry: A voluntary group which seeks to conserve the Shirtcliffe Valley, Smelter Wood and Myrtle Banks Farm. Also supports and has concern for wider environmental issues and the quality of life.

ProvisionPlace.entry: Shubert Bridge (Opposite South Yorkshire Fire & Rescue Training Centre)

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 1st Sun in the month 2-4pm, occasional Ranger workdays at 2pm
